Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Joy_03>No matter! Once again, you're too late.
I've already dug up all the <clr:0000>crystallized
charges <clr:ffff>this place had to offer.
Talk_0020: Our next encounter will be our last.
Talk_0016:
Uh... The steering stick got wet, so my
hand slipped!
Talk_0022:
That's where I'll use those charges to
activate our <clr:0000>ultimate weapon<clr:ffff>, offer it
to the Demon King, and...
Talk_0031: I just got word from my underlings...
Talk_0025:
It's time to start the final excavation. The
<clr:0000>Northwestern Abandoned Mine <clr:ffff>awaits.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Talk_01>We have more than enough <clr:0000>crystallized
charges<clr:ffff> now...
Talk_0033:
One teeny, little step until the Yiga Clan's
longstanding desire comes to fruition!
Talk_0034:
And there's only one more abandoned
mine to ransack.
